text: Ezɨ kamaghɨra, gumazitam nan Akar Gavgavir kɨ Devit ko dɨkɨrɨzir kam abɨghan kogham, Devit nan ingangarir gumazim. Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kam kamaghɨn ghaze, Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn, atriviba zurara otivɨra ikiam. Ezɨ uaghan, kɨ Livain anabamɨn ofa gamir gumaziba ko, Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim gamua ghaze, Livain ofa gamir gumaziba, me zurara nan ingangarir gumazibar ikiam. Eghtɨ gumazitam Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kam abighan kogham.
